subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2624, how did it go?
description_text:
Still haven’t received it yet.  


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


On Friday, October 3, 2025, 1:33 PM, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeff Gibson,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break and will resume shipping your order on the 9th. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

how's that holiday going ? I'm really close to just disputing the charges since i have never received part . consider this as notification .
jeff gibson

Hi Jeff Gibson,    We sincerely apologise for the delay in processing your email. Please verify your delivery address details. We shall arrange for your parcel to be re-shipped via FedEx Express and it should arrive shortly. Kindly reply promptly as stock levels at our US warehouse are running low. Our deepest apologies!  MAINT SUP JEFF  2140 West Greenway #B  Phoenix, AZ 85023  United States  +1 480-658-8006

lets send to the billing address might be easier
8639 west meadow dr peoria az 85382
jeff gibson
Hi Jeff Gibson,    Okay, we've updated your address. Here's your FedEx tracking link.  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=394418471649

Hi Jeff Gibson,     We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please contact FedEx to provide additional information to prevent the package from being returned again. Here is your tracking number: 394418471649  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=394418471649&trkqual=12029~394418471649~FDEG
